attributes.action: Lower the Age to vote to the age of 15
attributes.additional_details: I also think that other people my age would want to vote as well but it would only be those who would really care would actually vote.
attributes.background: I am putting this down as a petition because I think by the age of 15 most teenagers have matured enough and those that won't have probably wouldn't vote because they would think it would look stupid. I am a 15 year old myself and I have my own view on politics and would like to be able to vote now
